alert.note: Alert for Inland Broward County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Broward County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 14 at 5:39PM EST by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Broward and south central Palm Beach Counties through 615 PM EST... At 539 PM EST, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles south of Loxahatchee NWR, or 10 miles northwest of Coral Springs, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Coral Springs, Parkland and Loxahatchee NWR. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Inland Broward County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Broward County
